verses.content: Chun, mi pakhat, Mari le a zuorpuinu Martha umna khuo Bethania mi, Lazar damnaw a um a.
(Mari, hriek rim inhnik Lal chu nâla, a sama a ke hrutu kha, kha minu ṭapa Lazar a nih dam naw chu.)
Chun, a farnuhaiin Isu kuomah, “Lalpa, ngai ta, i hmangai kha a damnaw ie,” tiin mi an tir a.
Isûn chu chu a hriet a, “Hi natna hi thina ding a ni nawh, Pathien ropuina ding a ni lem, Pathien Naupa chu hi lei hin a la mawina dingin,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn Martha hai, a zuor- puinu hai, Lazar hai a hmangai a.
Chuleiin, a damnaw ti a hrietin a umna ngaiah ni hni a la um ta rawp a.
Chun, chu hnunga chun a închûktirhai kuomah, “Judai ramah fe nâwk ei tiu,” a ta.
Chun, inchûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Rabbi, kha hma el khan Judahaiin lunga dêng an tum che kha; chuong sa sa chun chutaka chun i la fe rawp ding am a nih?” an ta.
Isûn, “Sûnah dârkâr sâwm le pahni a um naw am a nih? Mi sûnah a lêng chun a pêm ngai nawh, hi khawvêl var hi a hmu leiin.
Amiruokchu, mi zânah a lêng chun a pêm hlak, amaa chun var a um naw leiin,” a ta, a dawn a.
Chuong thu chu a hril a; chun, chu hnunga chun an kuomah, “Ei ruolpa Lazar chu a ininnghil tah a; a ininnghil keihar dingin ka fe ding a nih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, inchûktirhai chun a kuomah, “Lalpa a ininnghil a ni chun dam nâwk el a tih,” an ta.
(Isûn a thi thu a hril a nih; nisienlakhawm, anni chun a châwl sûnga a ininnghil thu a hril amanih an ta.)
Chuongchun, Isûn fietakin an kuomah a hril a, “Lazar a thi a nih.
Chutaka ka um naw chu ka lâwm pêk cheu, in ring theina dingin; nisienlakhawm, a kuomah fêng ei tiu,” a ta.
Chun, Thoma (Didum an ti bawk) chun, ân chûktir chanpuihai kuomah, “A thinaa thi ve dingin fe vêng ei tiu,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Isûn a tlung chun, ni li thlânah a lo um tah ti a hriet a,
Bethani chu Jerusalem kâwl a na, fing sâwmpanga laia hla a nih;
chuongchun, an ṭapa thi chunga sukthlamuong dingin Judahai rawi tamtak Martha le Mari kuomah an hung a.
Martha chun Isu a hung ding a nih ti a hriet phingleh a va tuok a; Mari ruok chu inah a la ṭhung zing a.
Chun, Martha chun Isu kuomah, “Lalpa hitaka um ni la chu, ka ṭapa a thi naw ding bah.
Tukhawm hin Pathien kuoma i ngên taphawt chu Pathienin pêng a ti che ti ka hriet,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “I ṭapa tho nâwk a tih,” a ta.
Martha chun a kuomah, “Ni kin nia, thonâwknaa chun thonâwk a tih ti ka hriet,” a ta.
Chun, Isûn a kuomah, “Kei hi thonâwkna le hringna chu ka nih; tûkhawm a mi ring chu thi sienla khawm hring zing a tih;
tukhawm a hring taphawt a mi ring chu kumkhuoin thi naw nih; chu thu chu i ring am?” a ta.
Ama chun a kuomah, “Ring e Lalpa, Krista, Pathien Naupa, khawvêla hung ding chu i ni ti ka ring ie,” a ta.
Chun, chu thu chu a hril zo phingleh a feh a, a zuorpuinu Mari chu inrûkin a va ko a, “Inchûktirtu hitakah a um a, a ko che,” a ta.
Ama chun chu chu a hriet phingleh a tho vak a, a kuomah a va feh a.
(Isu chu khuo a la lût nawh a, Marthain a va tuok laia, a umna ngaiah a la um a.)
In sûnga a thlamuongtu a umpui Judahai chun, Mari a tho vaka, a suok an hmu phingleh, thlâna ṭap dingin a fe amanih an ta, an zui a.
Chun, Mari chun Isu umna chu a va tlung a, a hmu phingleh a ke bulah a bawkkhup a, a kuomah, “Lalpa, hitaka um ni la chu ka ṭapa a thi naw ding bah,” a ta.
Isu chun Mari ṭap le a hung zuitu Judahai ṭap chu a hmuin, a lungrilin ân rûm a, a lungngai a.
“Ama chu khâwlai am in inzâl a?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, hung la, en ta,” an ta.
Isu a ṭap tah a.
Chun, Judahai chun, “En ta u, Lazar hi a lo va hmangai deh e!” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, ṭhenkhat chun, “Hi mitdel mit sukvartu hin, hi mipa khawm hi ân thi naw tir thei naw am a nih?” an ta.
Chun, Isu chu a lungrilin ân rûm nâwk a, thlân chu a tlung tah a. Chu thlân chu pûk a na, a kawtkhâra chun lung pakhat a um a.
Isûn, “Lung hi dawm tâwl ro,” a ta. A thipa farnu Martha chun a kuomah, “Lalpa, tuhin chu thu tâng a tih, a thina ni li a ni ta sih a,” a ta.
Isûn a kuomah, “I ring chun Pathien ropuizie hmûng i tih, ka ti naw che am a nih?” a ta.
Chuongchun, lung chu an dawm tâwl a. Chun, Isu a dâk a, “Pa, ka thu i ngai leiin i chungah ka lâwm ie.
Kumkhuoin ka thu i ngai hlak ti ka hriet zing a nih; nisienlakhawm, mipui ngîr khup lei hin chu chu ka ti a nih, nangin i mi tir ti an ring theina dingin,” a ta.
Chun, chuonga a ṭawng zo phingleh râwl inringtakin, “Lazar, hung suok rawh,” a ta, a khêk a.
Mithi chu a kut a ke thlân puona tuom pumin a hung suok tah a, a hmai chu inhrûkna puona tuom a nih. Isûn an kuomah, “Sût unla, infetir ro,” a ta.
Chuleichun, Mari lêngpuitu Isu thilthaw hmu Juda mi tamtakin Isu an ring tah a.
Nisienlakhawm, a ṭhen Phari- saihai kuomah an va feh a, an kuomah Isu thilthawhai chu an hril a.
Chuongchun, thiempu lalhai le Pharisaihai chun rorêltuhai an ko khâwm a, “Iengtin am thâwng ei ta? Hi mipa hin thilmak tamtak a thaw sih a.
Hieng anga ei thlathlam el chun mi po poin ama ring an ta; chun, Roma mihai hung an ta, ei hmun le ei chihai hi mi lâkpêk an tih,” an ta.
Chun, anni laia mi pakhat, Kaiapha, chu kuma Thiempu Laltak chun an kuomah, “Nangnîn ieng- khawm in hriet dêr nawh.
Ei chi po po bohmang nawna dingin, mi po po nêka mi pakhat thi in ta dingin a ṭha ti in ngaituo bawk nawh,” a ta.
(Chu thu chu ama phuok- fâwmin a hril nawh, chu kum chun Thiempu Laltak a na, an chihai nêka Isu a thi ding thu a hril lâwk a ni lem.
Chuhai chihai ai chau chun a ni nawh, Pathien nau khawvêla indarhai po po pâwl khata a ṭhuoi khâwmna dingin a ni bawk.)
Chuongchun, chu ni chena inthawk chu ama sukhlum dingin an inrâwn rawp a.
Chuleiin, Isu chu Judahai lai ân langin a lêng nâwk ta nawh a, chutaka inthawkin thlalêr dep tienga khaw pakhat Ephraim an tia chun a va fe ta lem a; chutaka chun inchûktirhai leh an um ta zing a.
Chun, Judahai Fekân Ruoiṭhe chu a hnai tah a, mi tamtak inthien dingin rama inthawk, Fekân Ruoiṭhe hma chun, Jerusalemah an hang feh a.
Chuongchun, Isu an zawng a, Pathien biekinah ngir pumin an inbiek a, “Ieng am in ring a? Ruoi- ṭhenaah hung naw ni maw?” an in tih a.
Thiempu Lalhai le Pharisai- haiin ama chu an man theina dingin tûkhawmin a umna an hriet chun phuong ding a nih ti thu an pêk ta sih a.
